ValidationRule.description: If you fill the name of unregistered corporate, Lead source should be 'corporate(unregistered)'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISBLANK( NameofUnregisteredCorporate_LeadSource__c ) ) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , 'Corporate(Unregistered)')) , NOT( ISPICKVAL( LeadSource , 'Corporate')) , $Label.Disable_all_validations_from_lead == "false" /*Added by Prashant to control disabling all validations together*/ )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Lead source should be 'Corporate(unregistered)' , when you fill the Name of Unregistered Corporate.
